data.title: New place, Had to try it out
data.text: I was impressed.  You get as many toppings as you want for the same price.  Very fresh and good.  They even make great salads.  Nice clean place and friendly workers.

data.title: Good pizza for good price.
data.text: My girlfriend and I ate here one date night and it was great. I had the barbecue pizza which was awesome and my girl had the chicken bacon ranch. Staff was kind and you get the food in a timely manner. We will be going back.

data.title: Great teamwork & hospitality
data.text: My family and I have visited the Marysville Mod and have never been disappointed. Today, I had the best pizza yet. It's usually crowded but the line moves pretty well. The staff works well together and greets you and says thank you when you leave. All in all, one of my favorite family places in town.

data.title: Choose all ingredients yourself!
data.text: This is a fun, fast place to eat - and you get exactly what you want because you choose all of the ingredients as you go through an order line. Pizzas and salads, a couple of dessert and breadstick type items. Very reasonable prices - my husband and I can eat there for under $20, sharing a MOD size pizza and salad. Smaller versions available.

data.title: Fast Service
data.text:
There is almost always a line here, but we ordered on line.  We walked in, right up to the cash register, and our pizzas were ready.  

If you are unfamiliar with MOD, for $7.87, you get a pizza with as many toppings as you want.  

If you walk in, you go to the counter and order.  Like, Subway, you can watch them make your pizza and request which toppings you like.  You would then pay and wait for your pizza to be cooked.
